title: 'Poor' F1 radio broadcasts make us look like whingers, say drivers
summary: "Unnecessary sometimes, poorly broadcast ... Misunderstood 99.9% of the time". Fernando Alonso was scathing about the choice of F1 radio messages heard in race coverage, and he wasn't the only driver expressing concerns
